name: Eyes of the Storm
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your eyes fill with lightning. You can't see normally, but you gain a top-down view of the surrounding area, able to see a 300 foot square centered on you. You can shift your vision to any area you please for 1 AP.

Nothing is hidden from you. You can see invisible and hidden creatures anywhere you are looking. You can choose to end this spell and fire a 5 foot wide, 5 foot tall bolt of lightning from your current location to target creature you can see. Every creature in the bolt must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 14d6 lightning damage, halved on a success.
